Token.Abstract: This protocol is designed to be used on all activity monitor devices. The methods enclosed ensure uniform operation with the application, irrespective of the specific device. It is used for polling so that all modifications are to the specific device and do not have cascading effects to the other devices.
This methods get an activity level. The result is defined in the DeviceTypes.h file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An integer value that corresponds with the activity level constants in DeviceTypes.h
